option1.name: includeChildProjects
option1.label: Include child project data? (True/False)
option1.description: Should the report include data from child projects? (True/False)

option2.name: includeComponentVersions
option2.label: Include versions numbers in report? (True/False)
option2.description: Should the report include component version numbers? (True/False)

option3.name: overrideExistingNoticesText
option3.label: Override any exiting 'Notices Text? (True/False)
option3.description: If there is already existing notices data should it be replaced with what was gathered? (True/False)
